title: Skin Concept // "Orianna Reveck"
body:
> _**Just An Idea That Hopefully Gets Noticed By Rito**_

Greetings from down under Rito,
So for a while I've been in love with Orianna {{champion:61}} . There is no one else quite like her in the game and is definitely one of my favourite champions. I usually don't read champion lores unless either 1. I love the champion or 2. I have nothing else to do, but recently I read Orianna's lore and thoroughly enjoyed it. Then an idea popped into my head. What if Orianna had a skin (legendary or ultimate) of when she was human? I know this may be a long process but I think it would bring more of her lore into the game, let people know how Orianna became the robot that she is today and personally I think it may look pretty cool. I haven't thought of a name for this skin but if you do end up doing this, please don't call it "Human Orianna" as that sounds not creative at all. Maybe call it "Orianna Reveck" as Reveck is the last name of her father "Corin Reveck". This is just an idea that I personally think isn't a bad one. Please put this into consideration as it will mean a lot to me.
If anyone has any further ideas towards this concept, please comment below your thoughts as this will also mean a lot to me.
Thank you for time,
Kind Regards,
SoogyDonuts (OCE)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Just for my understanding

> Then an idea popped into my head. What if Orianna had a skin (legendary or ultimate) of when she was human? I know this may be a long process but I think it would bring more of her lore into the game, let people know how Orianna became the robot that she is today and personally I think it may look pretty cool.


Do you mean if she was built to look *more* human?

First of all, Thank You for commenting and reading my idea. What I mean is that Orianna was actually a human before she was made into the robot we know today, so they should make a skin of Orianna when she was _human. _ So not make her _look_ human but make a skin where Orianna is an _actual_ human being. Apologies for any misunderstandings. 
SoogyDonuts (OCE)

To the best of my understanding the Orianna we know was never human, but rather her creator's daughter Orianna died, and he made the robot Orianna in her place. 

In her original lore which I think has been changed now robot Orianna joined the League because human Orianna had always wanted to, and that's why Corin made her combat capable so she could fulfill his daughter's dream.

I think it would be a cool skin tho :P

I think it would be a cool skin too (hence this post) XD Glad you like it!
SoogyDonuts (OCE)

I'd say this would fit well as an ultimate skin because it's lore based similar to Spirit Guard Udyr which will also add a bit more depth into Orianna and might encourage me to play her until I get her out of Mastery 4. XD

Hehe, I was stuck in Mastery 4 with Orianna for ages too, but now I'm level 5 with her aiming for level 6. Thanks for the reply!
SoogyDonuts (OCE)
wow this is actually good. riot plz make this skin{{champion:61}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

Hehe, I'm glad you think this "actually good"! Thank You 
SoogyDonuts (OCE)
